title: 为什么我服务器领地插件用不了
author: WW_GG

replies.author: MuaMua
replies.txt_content:
WW_GG 发表于 2016-4-27 20:59
没   什么权限都没给。
下面的权限给玩家即可：
    - residence.create
    - residence.rename
    - residence.create
    - residence.delete
    - residence.create.subzone
    - residence.delete.subzone
    - residence.expand
    - residence.expand.subzone
    - residence.contract
    - residence.contract.subzone
    - residence.select
    - residence.resize
    - residence.chatcolor
    - residence.chatkick
    - residence.compass
    - residence.randomtp
    - residence.group.Default

replies.author: WW_GG
replies.txt_content:
MuaMua 发表于 2016-4-27 21:01
residence.create等对应权限给了吗
没   什么权限都没给。

replies.author: MuaMua
replies.txt_content:
MuaMua 发表于 2016-4-27 21:06
下面的权限给玩家即可：
    - residence.create
    - residence.rename
抱歉，   - residence.create  多打了一次，重复了。

replies.author: 毒药丶Dian
replies.txt_content: 你没给玩家权限怎么圈地
